data.title: Maxwell Tickets - 2024 Tour Dates
data.meta_description: Get your Maxwell concert tickets now! Experience the soulful R&B icon live with his smooth vocals and timeless hits. Find great deals on your concert tickets today.
data.text:
Maxwell Concert Tickets

Experience a night of R&B, soul, and jazz when you purchase Maxwell tickets via TicketSmarter. Gerald Maxwell Rivera born May 23, 1973, known more by his stage name Maxwell is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, and multi-instrumentalist. Along with other artists such as D’Angelo and Erykah Badu. Maxwell has been credited with shaping what is labeled these days as the neo-soul genre, a sub-genre of R&B that has been gaining popularity since the late 1990s. Maxwell was born in Brooklyn, New York the son of a Haitian mother and a Puerto Rican father. After receiving a low-cost Casio keyboard from a friend at the age of 17 the young musician began composing music.

Maxwell credits his early influence to acts such as Patrice Rushen, S.O.S Band and Rose Royce. Maxwell began teaching himself to play various instruments that helped his creativity and sound. In the mid-1990s Maxwell began working with songwriter Leon Ware and guitarist Wah Wah Watson to record his debut album which was completed in 1995 The album was presented to Columbia Records but was shelved for over a year. The album debuted at number 38 on the R&B hip-hop charts. The album was later ranked as one of the year's top 10 best albums by Time, Rolling Stone and USA Today. It was also nominated for a Grammy Award for Best R&B Album at the 39th Grammy Awards. Maxwell tickets are available now, secure your Maxwell tickets and make TicketSmarter the home for all your ticketing needs.

How much are Maxwell tickets?

Maxwell tour tickets are not too expensive. A concertgoer can expect to pay upwards of $80 for a general admission ticket. For a main floor ticket, you can expect to pay between $150 for a closer ticket and $80 for a rear orchestra ticket. The mezzanine section sells in a range of $50-$90. And balcony tickets sell in a range of $30-$70. $197.17 is the average price you’ll pay for entry to see Maxwell perform live. Many of the singer’s live performances have cheap Maxwell tickets posted for just $5.47 a ticket. The most you can expect to pay to see Maxwell live in concert is $6124.50.

Maxwell 2024 Tour Dates

Maxwell is a successful artist who has been involved in many tours and music festivals. You don’t want to miss the next live performance that comes to a city near you. You can expect to see Maxwell tour stops at venues including the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C. with artists like Kenny G, Maroon 5, and Mariah Carey. The Peacock Theater with musicians such as Tori Kelly, Remy Ma, and Beyonce. And the New Orleans Jazz and Heritage Festival at Fairgrounds in New Orleans, Louisiana. Secure your Maxwell concert tickets today via TicketSmarter.

2024 is your year to see Maxwell live in concert. Maxwell 2024 tour will see the singer perform 26 concerts in cities around the country. Be there for Maxwell next performance on September 14th, 2024 at 7:30pm at the Hard Rock Live Hollywood at 1 Seminole Way, Hollywood, FL. TicketSmarter currently has 1774 Maxwell with Jazmine Sullivan and October London tickets posted for this concert. Maxwell concert tickets range from $91.73 - $1831.50.

When do Maxwell tickets go on sale?

Tickets for Maxwell are available now and do not require a presale code. Be sure to check back with the TicketSmarter website to be updated on any additional information and tour dates.

Songs from the Maxwell Tour Setlist

Maxwell's setlist while performing in Miami Gardens , FL at “Hard Rock Stadium” included the following songs:

Sumthin' Sumthin'

Dancewitme

Fortunate

Do Me, Baby

Lifetime

Bad Habits

Stop the World

Always and Forever

Off

Pretty Wings

Get to Know Ya

Ascension (Don't Ever Wonder)

Source: Setlist.fm
